description: This file defines a Python class BraveSearchTools that provides an interface for performing web searches using the Brave search engine API. It includes methods for initializing the search client and executing search queries, returning results in JSON format.

classes.name: BraveSearchTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for searching Brave using the Brave API, extending the Toolkit base class.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the BraveSearchTools with API key, max results, and language settings, and sets up the Brave client.

methods.name: brave_search
methods.description: Performs a search query on Brave and returns the results as a formatted JSON string.
